title: Living with the Cat: The 9 Biggest Reasons Why Your Life Sucks!
description: So, your life sucks, does it? For the longest time you had this perfect image of how things were supposed to turn out. Yet here you are, standing uncomfortably in front of the self-help section of the bookstore, secretly hoping you won't run into anyone you know. Where the heck did it all go wrong? In this, his second book, author Jason Lee pulls no punches. A perfect blend of quirky sarcasm, retro-pop references and deep-dish insight, this off-the-beaten-path guide will provide you with an entirely new outlook on life: one that will fill your life with delight, optimism and happiness.
author: Jason   Lee
